section_overview: Wellington International is the heart of the Winter Equestrian Festival. Expect heavy traffic on Pierson Rd and South Shore—plan early coffee runs and later downtown dinners accordingly.
section_cta_text: Want a smoother WEF season? I can help with flights, hotel blocks, and barn logistics.

section_meta_description: Insider essentials for WEF: parking tips, early coffee near barns, lunch between classes, and trainer dinners downtown.

section_open_graph_description: Practical Wellington tips from a show-mom travel advisor: parking, coffee, and late-night dining during WEF.
